info.name: Modern Papoo
info.description:
Redesigns the backend of Papoo CMS.

Want to write your own styles?

Try this new CSS preprocessor! You can download the latest release from github here.
info.additionalInfo:
Change the domain to your interna folder of your Papoo-Installation.

Version: 0.9 - 26.04.17
-------------------------
Styled list/table views and additional form elements.
Restyled the login view.


Version: 0.8 - 25.04.17
